summary: The module implements a set of classes that model Google Smart Home traits such as brightness, color spectrum, color temperature, on/off, scene activation, and temperature setting. Each trait class handles command execution, attribute queries, capability description, and state synchronization for Home Assistant entities, building on a common base trait class that encapsulates the generic logic for determining executability and managing interactions with the Google Assistant ecosystem.
business_intent: Enable Home Assistant devices to be controlled through Google Assistant by mapping Google Smart Home traits to Home Assistant services and state attributes, thereby providing seamless voiceâ€‘controlled automation and integration with the Google ecosystem.
